CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[P_TableComment] @TableName AS SYSNAME ,@Comment AS SYSNAME AS BEGIN
IF ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FN_ListExtendedProperty('MS_Description', 'SCHEMA', 'dbo', 'TABLE', @TableName, NULL, NULL)) >= 1) EXEC SP_UpdateExtendedProperty 'MS_Description' ,@Comment ,'SCHEMA' ,'dbo' ,'TABLE' ,@TableName ,NULL ,NULL ELSE EXEC SP_AddExtendedProperty 'MS_Description' ,@Comment ,'SCHEMA' ,'dbo' ,'TABLE' ,@TableName ,NULL ,NULL END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[P_ColumnComment] @TableName AS SYSNAME ,@ColumnName AS SYSNAME ,@Comment AS SYSNAME AS BEGIN
IF ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FN_ListExtendedProperty('MS_Description', 'SCHEMA', 'dbo', 'TABLE', @TableName, 'COLUMN', @ColumnName)) >= 1) EXEC SP_UpdateExtendedProperty 'MS_Description' ,@Comment ,'SCHEMA' ,'dbo' ,'TABLE' ,@TableName ,'COLUMN' ,@ColumnName ELSE EXEC SP_AddExtendedProperty 'MS_Description' ,@Comment ,'SCHEMA' ,'dbo' ,'TABLE' ,@TableName ,'COLUMN' ,@ColumnName END
